In southeast, cyclonic 4 to 6, becoming southwesterly then cyclonic later, 6 to gale 8 later. In northwest, southwesterly 5 to 7, veering westerly or southwesterly 3 to 5 later.

Weather
In southeast, showers, rain later. In northwest, rain.

In southeast, good, occasionally poor. In northwest, good, occasionally poor.
